title: ‘Detachment was considered a strength’: how a war correspondent’s calling created a trauma timebomb
description: From the Boxing Day tsunami to Iraq, journalist Dean Yates rarely stopped to process the events he reported. They caught up with him in a Melbourne hospitalDean Yates was working in Reuters’ Jakarta newsroom on the night of 12 October 2002, when he took a cal…
content: Dean Yates was working in Reuters Jakarta newsroom on the night of 12 October 2002, when he took a call from a stringer in Bali. There had been a blast, the caller explained, with flaming cars and mu… [+7264 chars]
